languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс подает вам знак.{/n} "Пока офицеры готовили этот брифинг, у меня было некоторое время, чтобы узнать, что произошло за время нашего отсутствия. Я обнаружил, что астропатический хор получил сообщение, адресованное мне... и я хотел бы при первой же возможности обсудить его. Дай мне знать, когда у тебя будет время для этого".

{n}Heinrix gestures to you.{/n} "While the officers were preparing this briefing, I had some time to find out what had happened in our absence. I discovered that the Astropathic Choir received a message addressed to me... which I'd like to discuss at the earliest opportunity. Let me know when you have time to do that."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс подает вам знак.{/n} "Пока офицеры готовили этот брифинг, у меня было некоторое время, чтобы узнать, что произошло за время нашего отсутствия. Я обнаружил, что астропатический хор получил сообщение, адресованное мне... и я хотел бы при первой же возможности обсудить его. Дай мне знать, когда у тебя будет время для этого".

I discovered that the astropathic choir had received a message addressed to me... which I'd like to discuss at the earliest opportunity. Let me know when you have time to do that."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希朝你做了个手势。{/n}“军官准备简报的这段时间里，我也弄清楚这段期间发生了什么事情。我发现，星语唱诗班给我发来了一条信息……我希望能尽早和你讨论一下这个问题。等你有时间的时候，我们坐下来谈谈吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gestures to you.{/n} "While the officers were preparing this briefing, I had some time to find out what had happened in our absence. I discovered that the Astropathic Choir received a message addressed to me... which I'd like to discuss at the earliest opportunity. Let me know when you have time to do that."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希朝你做了个手势。{/n}“军官准备简报的这段时间里，我也弄清楚这段期间发生了什么事情。我发现，星语唱诗班给我发来了一条信息……我希望能尽早和你讨论一下这个问题。等你有时间的时候，我们坐下来谈谈吧。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix winkt dich herbei.{/n} "Während die Offiziere dieses Briefing vorbereitet haben, hatte ich Zeit, in Erfahrung zu bringen, was in unserer Abwesenheit geschehen ist. Ich habe herausgefunden, dass der astropathische Chor eine Nachricht an mich erhalten hat. Ich möchte baldmöglichst mit Euch darüber sprechen. Lasst mich wissen, wenn Ihr Zeit dafür habt."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gestures to you.{/n} "While the officers were preparing this briefing, I had some time to find out what had happened in our absence. I discovered that the Astropathic Choir received a message addressed to me... which I'd like to discuss at the earliest opportunity. Let me know when you have time to do that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix winkt dich herbei.{/n} "Während die Offiziere dieses Briefing vorbereitet haben, hatte ich Zeit, in Erfahrung zu bringen, was in unserer Abwesenheit geschehen ist. Ich habe herausgefunden, dass der astropathische Chor eine Nachricht an mich erhalten hat. Ich möchte baldmöglichst mit Euch darüber sprechen. Lasst mich wissen, wenn Ihr Zeit dafür habt."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix llama tu atención con un gesto.{/n} «Mientras los oficiales preparaban esta reunión, he tenido ocasión de investigar lo que ha sucedido en nuestra ausencia. He descubierto que el coro Astropático había recibido un mensaje dirigido a mí... del que me gustaría hablar con usted lo antes posible. Avíseme cuando tenga tiempo para ello».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gestures to you.{/n} "While the officers were preparing this briefing, I had some time to find out what had happened in our absence. I discovered that the Astropathic Choir received a message addressed to me... which I'd like to discuss at the earliest opportunity. Let me know when you have time to do that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix llama tu atención con un gesto.{/n} «Mientras los oficiales preparaban esta reunión, he tenido ocasión de investigar lo que ha sucedido en nuestra ausencia. He descubierto que el coro Astropático había recibido un mensaje dirigido a mí... del que me gustaría hablar con usted lo antes posible. Avíseme cuando tenga tiempo para ello».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vous interpelle d'un geste.{/n} « Pendant que les officiers préparaient cette réunion, j'ai pris le temps de me renseigner quant aux événements survenus en notre absence. J'ai découvert que le chœur astropathique avait reçu un message qui m'était destiné... et dont j'aimerais vous parler dès que possible. Prévenez-moi quand vous aurez le temps d'en discuter. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gestures to you.{/n} "While the officers were preparing this briefing, I had some time to find out what had happened in our absence. I discovered that the Astropathic Choir received a message addressed to me... which I'd like to discuss at the earliest opportunity. Let me know when you have time to do that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vous interpelle d'un geste.{/n} « Pendant que les officiers préparaient cette réunion, j'ai pris le temps de me renseigner quant aux événements survenus en notre absence. J'ai découvert que le chœur astropathique avait reçu un message qui m'était destiné... et dont j'aimerais vous parler dès que possible. Prévenez-moi quand vous aurez le temps d'en discuter. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは身振り手振りであなたに話しかける。{/n}「士官たちがこのブリーフィングの準備をしている間、少し時間があったので俺たちが不在の間に何が起こったのか調べた。感応通信聖歌隊が俺宛のメッセージを受け取っていたことがわかった。この件について早急に話し合いたい。時間があるときに知らせてくれ」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gestures to you.{/n} "While the officers were preparing this briefing, I had some time to find out what had happened in our absence. I discovered that the Astropathic Choir received a message addressed to me... which I'd like to discuss at the earliest opportunity. Let me know when you have time to do that."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは身振り手振りであなたに話しかける。{/n}「士官たちがこのブリーフィングの準備をしている間、少し時間があったので俺たちが不在の間に何が起こったのか調べた。感応通信聖歌隊が俺宛のメッセージを受け取っていたことがわかった。この件について早急に話し合いたい。時間があるときに知らせてくれ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, seni işaret ediyor.{/n} "Subaylar bu raporu hazırlarken senin yokluğunda yaşananları öğrenmeye vaktim oldu. Astropatik Koro'nun bana gönderilmiş bir mesaj aldığını öğrendim... En kısa zamanda bunu seninle konuşmak isterim. Vaktin olduğunda haber ver."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gestures to you.{/n} "While the officers were preparing this briefing, I had some time to find out what had happened in our absence. I discovered that the Astropathic Choir received a message addressed to me... which I'd like to discuss at the earliest opportunity. Let me know when you have time to do that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix sana işaret ediyor.{/n} "Subaylar bu toplantıya hazırlanırken sen yokken yaşananları öğrenmek için biraz vaktim oldu. Astropatik Koro'nun bana gönderilen bir mesaj aldığını öğrendim... En kısa zamanda bunu seninle tartışmak isterim. Vaktin olduğunda haber ver."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
